desc: Rappahannock Farmer's Market is open every Saturday. Order our farm products online (Monday 8:00AM thru Thursday Noon) for pickup at the Rappahannock Farmer's Market on Saturdays from 10:00 - Noon at the new Pen Druid parking lot 3863 Sperryville Pike, Sperryville. We can't wait to see you!

layout.text:
A FAMILY OWNED AND OPERATED FARM IN FLINT HILL, VA
For thirty years and three generations we have run sheep and cattle on Over Jordan Farm, nestled in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains in western Virginia.
